text: Chrosioderma is a genus of Malagasy huntsman spiders that was first described by Eugène Louis Simon in 1897. ==Species== it contains nine species, found on Madagascar: *Chrosioderma albidum Simon, 1897 (type) – Madagascar *Chrosioderma analalava Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma havia Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma mahavelona Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma mipentinapentina Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma namoroka Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma ranomafana Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma roaloha Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar *Chrosioderma soalala Silva-Dávila, 2005 – Madagascar ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of Madagascar
title: Chrosioderma
